hero.name: Gabriel Ivan Setyaputra
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.bio: Experienced Software Engineer with expertise in Flutter, React.js, and web/mobile development. Improved user engagement and optimized processes at Grab.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate software engineer with over 3 years of experience in developing mobile and web applications. I specialize in Flutter, React.js, and full-stack development, with a proven track record of improving user engagement and optimizing development processes.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Informatics Engineering

roles.title: Mobile Engineer - Flutter (Mex App)
achievements: Improved user feedback positive response rates from 79% to 91%
Enhanced mobile app performance and user experience
Implemented new features using Flutter and Dart

roles.title: Software Engineer - Web (Mex Onboarding)
achievements: Developed and maintained web onboarding platform
Optimized user onboarding flow and processes

roles.title: Software Engineer - Web & Flutter (POS)
achievements: Built point-of-sale system using web and mobile technologies
Integrated payment systems and inventory management

roles.title: Full-Stack Developer
achievements: Built with MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)
Implemented user authentication and data management features

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects. Feel free to reach out!
